name: Cyber-Cat
description:
Cyber-Cat is a fast-paced, action, first-person shooter, where you take control of a cat with cybernetic enhancements and outfitted with advanced weaponry.

Story:

The ancient dark lord Venemos has awakened, and has overtaken the Land of Eternal Happiness. He has raised the greatest army the realm has ever seen and slaughtered all who refused the bend the knee. In desperation, the High Council has called upon the legendary warrior Cyber-Cat to end his reign and restore peace.

Released from his perpetual torment, where his rage grew to an indescribable state after the extinction of his species, the public torture of his family, and the desolation brought to the realm he swore to protect. Cyber-Cat will stop at nothing to get his vengeance, and defeat Venemos, the one responsible for it all. He will not relent until he achieves his goal, destroying anything or anyone that stands in his way. 

Download and play the first level. 

Note: Pre-Alpha build, does not represent the final game.

Controls:

W,A,S,D = Move

Mouse1 = Fire Weapon

Mouse2 = Shotgun Blast

Space = Jump

Shift = Boost/Dash
